meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Megan Gardner Katie Wroblewski Jerome Azbell Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6884.

td.p: Megan Gardner, an electrical engineer from Columbia, Maryland
Katie Wroblewski, a graduate student in history from Ypsilanti, Michigan
Jerome Azbell, a library reference clerk from Smyrna, Tennessee (whose 1-day cash winnings total $13,999)

tr.td: LITERARY SIGNIFICANT OTHERS
(Alex: You'll love it.)
NATIONAL SCENIC BYWAYS
OFFICE SEEKER, DISAPPOINTED
A KILLEE'S HEELS
MYTHS BUSTED BY MYTHBUSTERS
TRIPLE "A"

tr.td: Ron Weasley

tr.td: Jerome
Katie
Megan
COUNTRY MUSIC MOVERS & SHAKERS
THE HIGHWAYMEN
"M"ENAGERIE
SIGNS & SYMBOLS
A RIVER RUNS BETWEEN THEM
(Alex: We'll give you two countries, and you give me the river that forms the main boundary between those countries.)
PORTMANTEAU WORDS

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
